pages.text: Changes in the environment make you feel cold or hot. So you have to do something to prevent yourself from heat stroke or frostbite.
Recipe: Made from stone in a stonecutter.
Warm yourself by carrying heated stones.
Craft leather or wolf armor to keep warm, or smith polar bear fur with your armor on a smithing table to give it thermal insulation properties.
Cold resistance potions can ward off the cold.
Overheating resistance potions can prevent you from heat stroke.
